## ğŸ’¡ Platform Overview

**OKX Fake Balance Generator** is an advanced simulation tool designed to create **realistic trading environments** on OKX exchange with customizable balances across all account types. Perfect for traders, educators, and developers needing to practice or test without financial risk.

> ğŸ”¥ Optimized for **trading simulation**, **strategy testing**, and **educational purposes** with full exchange interface replication.

---

## âš¡ Core Capabilities

### ğŸ¯ Simulation Features
- **Multi-Account Support**: Spot, Futures, Margin, Earn, Funding accounts
- **Custom Balance Display**: Set any amount for 300+ cryptocurrencies
- **Realistic Trading Interface**: Full order book, charts, and trading panels
- **Market Simulation**: Real-time price feeds and volatility
- **Portfolio Management**: Complete portfolio tracking simulation
- **Trading History**: Generate realistic trade records and P&L

### ğŸ”§ Technical Specifications
- **Full Interface Replication**: Web and mobile OKX interface simulation
- **Trading Pair Support**: All major trading pairs (BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, etc.)
- **Order Type Simulation**: Market, Limit, Stop-Limit, OCO orders
- **Leverage Simulation**: Up to 125x for futures trading
- **Risk Management**: Simulated liquidation levels and margin calls

## âš ï¸ Usage Guidelines

> **IMPORTANT NOTICE**: This software is for **educational, testing, and simulation purposes only**. Generated balances and trading activities are **NOT REAL** and have no financial value. Do not attempt to use simulated balances for real trading. Always conduct real trading on official OKX exchange with real funds at your own risk.
